Please consider adding the option of gameplay to survive however long you can. At first I was curious as to how long the surviving time requirement will be till I defeat the game, and it appears from online research is that there is a limit to the number of days which is generated at random. The game is fun and so extending the numbers of days to unlimited creates a whole new challenge for the players.

Best survival game I‚Äôve played on iphone.

Played lots of survival games in my time, and this one is too hard to find it enjoyable. The RNG screws you over a lot. Sites that claim to have certain items, like food for example, offer nothing but wood and mechanical parts. Day cycle isn‚Äôt long enough. No tutorial of any sort throws you right into the game wasting precious day time trying to figure out the mechanics. Backpack storage is laughably low it‚Äôs almost non-existent. I want to like this game based on what I‚Äôve heard about it and I‚Äôve wanted to play it for so many years but the mechanics just make it not fun at all.

content.label: Thank you for finally fixing it! The stories are great. I am considering buying the little ones.

I‚Äôve been playing TWoM ever since it came out. Cheesy, I know. But I can guarantee that you will not be disappointed by the game when you purchase it. The different storylines and the different characters are variety to how you can play things out. The Little Ones DLC also adds a level of excitement and more depth to the game as you are forced to decide what to do with the lives of kids.

Overall, fantastic game. 5/5

content.label: I would love if you would give us the option in the settings to put the game in 60hz or even 120hz. I know my 12.9‚Äù 2018 iPad Pro can handle either for this game. Otherwise, it‚Äôs great! Love it! It‚Äôll get a 5/5 IF it gets those frame rate supports.  For now, 4/5.
THE GAME IS ABSOLUTELY fantastic and try to keep supporting the game thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è

Lets start with the price, it was a bit of a turn-off for me at first since I like games that allow trials first before you pay.  After purchasing, playing, dying, playing then dying some more I realized two key things that separates this game from the rest and that‚Äôs how each replay is different from the last and the emotional bond you create with your characters throughout the gameplay (this is being typed from a emotionless person).   You feel the suffering, conflict, and choices they each make.  You are not a alpha, but at times you make alpha choices.  I have the worst internet connection possible and have had no issues playing the game, so that is a plus for anyone with connectivity issues aswell. Overall, a money tight-wads opinion like myself would say that this game is beyond getting, you will not regret it.

I played all the scenarios. Really an awesome game. I am hoping for more updates. Maybe more characters and story lines. And it would be nice if the characters can have more interactions with each other.
Love all of it. Freaking epic. Only a couple of things i would add if possible. Make the game longer, add more spots. New challenges etc.
